sentences: The SBSTA first considered this issue (FCCC/SB/2013/INF.2, INF.3.
No joint SBSTA/SBI contact group on this issue was possible since the SBI was unable to agree on its agenda.
Four in-forum workshops co-chaired by SBSTA Chair Muyungi and SBI Chair Chruszczow took place, summarized under the SBI above (see page 4).
Protocol Article 2.3 (adverse effects of policies and measures): Parties disagreed on whether to consider this issue together with the item on response measures.
The report of the session reflects that SBSTA and SBI will continue consultations on how to consider this item at SB 39.
